segments.text: I see the water from the sink creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to it, which is surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is already tilting, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's like she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get into trouble if the woman catches him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing freely, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this scene has been going on like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don't want to cause a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
